thread.title: Referee Agbovi to officiate Congo, Central Africa Republic CHAN qualifier
thread.title_full: Referee Agbovi to officiate Congo, Central Africa Republic CHAN qualifier

title: Referee Agbovi to officiate Congo, Central Africa Republic CHAN qualifier
text:
11:42 CET Referee Agbovi to officiate Congo, Central Africa Republic CHAN qualifier By Ghana FA 
Referee William Selorm Agbovi has been selected to officiate the Championship of African nations Cup qualifying match between DR Congo and Central Africa Republic. 
The match will be played between October 16-18 in Kinshasha DR Congo. 
Referee Agbovi will be assisted by compatriots Dawood Brimah Yamdogo Ouedrago and David Nelson Agyin with Daniel Nii Ayi Laryea as the reserve referee. 
Marcel Njipendi Kuotu from Cameroon has been assigned as the Match Commissioner for the match. Sports News Follow Us He who has an engel as a friend doesnt have to be afraid of anything in this world By: akoaso-HH
